description:
Warm tights for those chilly days in the saddle. Made from a lightweight fleece, the Provincial Thermal Tights hold onto your warmth while wicking away sweat. An integral chamois means no need for liners and you’ll stay comfy while on the go. Bibs make these tights more comfortable than snug waisted cycling pants. And with ample reflective details on the upper and lower legs, you can feel a little better about low light rides.

  • Stretchy nylon blend is warm, wicking and dries quickly
  • Highly breathable bib straps reduce overheating when you’re working hard
  • Fitted waist stays up even when you’re shrugged out of the bib straps
  • Elastic Interface Tirreno Plus chamois offers supportive protection for improved blood flow, while wicking away moisture, wings on the side are easy on your inner thighs while pedaling
  • Reflective details on thighs and calves help keep you seen and really stand out while pedaling
  • Antimicrobial treatment Means every ride doesn’t need to end in the laundry room
  • Trim, athletic fit isn’t Euro tight, but won’t catch the wind
name: MEC Provincial Thermal Bib Tights with Chamois - Men's
